entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
